text: Trexo Robotics | Toronto | Full-time | Onsite | VISA | www.trexorobotics.com Trexo Robotics is an exoskeleton robotics start up working towards making mobility a reality for the disabled and elderly. Founded by Waterloo mechatronics graduates we strive to provide a strong engineering culture and believe in getting things done. Currently Trexo Robotics is working on a rehabilitation exoskeleton for children with lower body movement disorders such as Cerebral Palsy and is looking for Robotics engineers to help with controls software and mechanical design. Please apply at: https://angel.co/trexo-robotics/jobs
